scripts.build: pnpm build:widget && pnpm build:widget-sandbox && pnpm build:statistics-dashboard && pnpm build:ressources-pages && pnpm build:api
scripts.dev:widget:publish: cd widget && pnpm build && yalc publish
scripts.dev:widget:push: cd widget && pnpm build && yalc push
scripts.dev:widget-sandbox:link: cd widget-sandbox && yalc add @betagouv/les-communs-widget && pnpm install
scripts.dev:widget-sandbox:unlink: cd widget-sandbox && yalc remove @betagouv/les-communs-widget && pnpm install
scripts.check-hooks: test -f .git/hooks/pre-commit || (echo '⚠️  Git hooks not installed! Run: pnpm prepare' && exit 1)
scripts.check-package-manager: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); if (fs.existsSync('package-lock.json')) { console.error('❌ npm detected! Remove package-lock.json and use pnpm'); process.exit(1); } if (fs.existsSync('yarn.lock')) { console.error('❌ yarn detected! Remove yarn.lock and use pnpm'); process.exit(1); } console.log('✅ Package manager check passed')"
